nodes.text: Spice spiders were members of a species of spider native to Taul. At some point prior to the Battle of Takodana, a group of droids stranded on Taul were ambushed by a swarm of spice spiders. Security droid PZ-99 then sacrificed himself to save the rest of the droids, of which only one would make it off the planet.
Spice spiders were created based off of concept art by Ralph McQuarrie,[source?] which was also the basis for the krykna and the knobby white ice spider.
